entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @AOC How can govt help gig workers who are not on payroll when and if they get COVID19 (or are quarantined) so they can keep paying bills and getting food instead of continuing to work and infect others? (I’m hearing about proposed plans to help ppl on payroll but not freelancers)
